crops.name: Wheat
crops.description: Wheat is a major cereal grain used for food and livestock feed.
crops.growthConditions: Requires a temperate climate with moderate rainfall.
crops.soilInformation: Prefers well-drained loamy soil with adequate nutrients.

crops.name: Rice
crops.description: Rice is a staple food for over half of the world's population.
crops.growthConditions: Grows well in warm climates with plenty of water.
crops.soilInformation: Best grown in water-retentive clay soils.

crops.name: Corn
crops.description: Corn is used for food, animal feed, and industrial products.
crops.growthConditions: Requires warm temperatures and moderate rainfall.
crops.soilInformation: Grows well in fertile, well-drained soils.

crops.name: Soybean
crops.description: Soybean is a leguminous crop widely grown for its edible bean.
crops.growthConditions: Thrives in warm climates with sufficient rainfall.

crops.name: Barley
crops.description: Barley is a cereal grain used for food, malt, and animal feed.
crops.growthConditions: Grows best in cooler climates with adequate moisture.
